original_text: Do not eat any of your offerings to the Lord in the places where you live. Do not eat the tithes that you have taken from your grain, your new wine or your olive oil. Do not eat at home the firstborn animals from your cows, sheep or goats. Do not eat the gifts that you have promised, the gifts that you choose to give or any other special gifts.
korean_text: 너는 곡식과 포도주와 기름의 십일조와 네 소와 양의 처음 난 것과 네 서원을 갚는 예물과 네 낙헌 예물과 네 손의 거제물은 네 각 성에서 먹지 말고

sentences.original_text: Do not eat any of your offerings to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 주께 드리는 너의 제물 중 어떤 것도 먹지 말라

sentences.original_text: in the places where you live
that you have taken from your grain
your new wine or your olive oil
sentences.korean_translation: 네 새 포도주나 너의 감람 기름

sentences.original_text: from your cows, sheep or goats
sentences.korean_translation: 네 소, 양 또는 염소 중에서

sentences.original_text: Do not eat the gifts that you have promised
the gifts that you choose to give
